scripts.check:locales: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const base=path.join(__dirname,'public','locales');const locales=['uk','ru','en'];const read=(locale)=>JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(path.join(base,locale,'translation.json'),'utf8'));const flatten=(obj,prefix='')=>Object.entries(obj||{}).reduce((acc,[k,v])=>{const next=prefix?prefix+'.'+k:k;if(v&&typeof v==='object'&&!Array.isArray(v)){Object.assign(acc,flatten(v,next));}else{acc[next]=v;}return acc;},{});const entries=locales.map((l)=>({locale:l,keys:new Set(Object.keys(flatten(read(l))))}));const allKeys=new Set(entries.flatMap((e)=>[...e.keys]));let hasMissing=false;for(const e of entries){const missing=[...allKeys].filter((k)=>!e.keys.has(k));if(missing.length){hasMissing=true;console.log('Missing in '+e.locale+':');missing.sort().forEach((k)=>console.log('  - '+k));}}if(!hasMissing){console.log('All locales complete. Keys: '+allKeys.size);} "
scripts.check:placeholders: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const base=path.join(__dirname,'public','locales');const locales=['uk','ru','en'];const read=(locale)=>JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(path.join(base,locale,'translation.json'),'utf8'));const flatten=(obj,prefix='')=>Object.entries(obj||{}).reduce((acc,[k,v])=>{const next=prefix?prefix+'.'+k:k;if(v&&typeof v==='object'&&!Array.isArray(v)){Object.assign(acc,flatten(v,next));}else{acc[next]=v;}return acc;},{});const rx=/\{\{\s*([\w\.]+)\s*\}\}/g;const maps=locales.map((l)=>({locale:l,map:flatten(read(l))}));const keys=maps.reduce((acc,m)=>{Object.keys(m.map).forEach((k)=>acc.add(k));return acc;},new Set());let issues=[];for(const key of keys){const values=maps.map((m)=>({locale:m.locale,val:m.map[key]}));if(values.some((v)=>typeof v.val!=='string')) continue;const sets=values.map(({locale,val})=>{const s=new Set();let a;while((a=rx.exec(val))){s.add(a[1]);}return {locale,placeholders:[...s].sort()};});const union=new Set(sets.flatMap((s)=>s.placeholders));if(sets.every((s)=>s.placeholders.length===union.size && s.placeholders.every((p)=>union.has(p)))) continue;issues.push({key,sets});}if(issues.length===0){console.log('All placeholders are consistent across locales.');}else{console.log('Placeholder mismatches found: '+issues.length);for(const i of issues){console.log('Key: '+i.key);for(const s of i.sets){console.log('  '+s.locale+': ['+s.placeholders.join(', ')+']');}}process.exitCode=1;}"
